concept.title: Simulated Data Stream Information for Each API
concept.shortdesc: Each of the APIs are connected to a JAVA app simulator which simulates city and enterprises data that mimics data from the node. You can use the APIs to gather and run simulated data prior to using real data, with the only difference being the datasource (simulated data is included in the product, real data is via permission). In order to retrieve the simulated data, use the following parameters:

ul.li: Streaming message intervals are between 15 to 25 seconds.
Estimate 500 messages per node per day.
Streaming message intervals are between 5 to 40 seconds.
Estimate 3400 messages per node per day.
Car In and Car Out range between 1 to 15 minutes.
Estimate about 70 messages per node per day.
This API request supports IMAGE, VIDEO, or AUDIO.

row.entry:
VLC coordinates are generated between 8 AM â€“ 6 PM UTC every day. Therefore, all the analytics work during this time range.
Simulated data is kept up to 1 week.

ENVIRONMENTAL
Carbon Dioxide
Humidity
Light Level
Occupancy
Temperature

Sensors generate an Occupancy event every 1 minute, if there is occupancy.
Sensors generate Temperature and Light Level events every 15 minutes.
Simulated data is kept up to 1 week.
